subject: Re: [junit] Re: Can I make junit run a testcase with difference setUp()?
msgSnippet: ... I assume that there is something about it that you don t like. What don t you like? -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
Carfield Yim wrote:

> > I recommend this approach:
> >
> > 1. Externalize the database connection parameters into JVM properties.
> > 2. Execute the test suite three times (from Ant, for example) with
> > different JVM properties for each set of database connection parameters.
> >
> > This is probably the path of least difficulty.
> > --
>
> That actually already done. Thx anyway.

I assume that there is something about it that you don't like. What
don't you like?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
